definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: You cannot improve a dull booby into a man of sense.
sentences.chinese: 你不能把傻頭傻腦的笨蛋改造成通情達理的人。

sentences.english: Joe played his part to a fault and looked silly before the audience.
sentences.chinese: 喬的表演太過火，現觀衆面前顯得傻頭傻腦。

sentences.english: He peeped into the room foolishly.
sentences.chinese: 他傻頭傻腦地向屋裏張望。

sentences.english: I'll thank you not to be silly and spoil my fun.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你，別這麼傻頭傻腦，敗了我的興致。
